Subject: Death and Resurection
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138

::Cygnar/Enertron/The Dragoon::
    He drops to his knees shots passing over his head.  "Good sir, I suggest 
we work together.  There are larger enemies here, to both of us."  Feeling 
confident he stands up and looks out the door.  One of Hellpeon's blasts 
catches him full in the chest flinging him against the back wall.  With his 
last breath he muttered.  "I shall return ... my ... liege..."  With that his 
head slumped down and his spark left to join the matrix.

    He was stopped along the way by another spark.  Enertron's spark, still 
struggling against the Matrix's pull was sitting in limbo.  He needed another 
spark's cooperation to overcome the pull.  They began to speak and it quickly 
became clear that neither was ready to die.  With Cygnar's added support 
Enertron pulled away from the Matrix and brought Cygnar with him.

    They returned to Earth and found an old discarded body.  When they tried 
to enter separately they found that they were no longer separate.  They had 
fused.  They could no longer exist without each other.  Together they 
inhabited the body, reformatting it to suit both of their needs.  It combined 
Cygnar's elegant beast mode with Enertron's dragonesque appearance.  The 
power over energy had faded, now limited to firing energy shots of varying 
strengths out of any part of their body.  With their new body the stood up 
and began to walk around to get their barings.  They found themselves 
surprisingly close to the Sulaco.  They made the short walk there and 
announced themselves to Magmatron.  "Sir.  We have returned!"
